data.description: I will be starting my 100 days of code today and for day 1 and most of week 1, I will be setting up the react App to get this ready, Links to all commits will be here

data.challenge: Get the Design of this Site Working
data.description: Today I will be working with ReactJS, HTML, CSS, to get most of the starter material working for this challenge.
This site is now live on Firebase and it should be visible to everyone now!

data.challenge: Unit Testing Our Website using Jest and Enzyme and more refining touches to the frontend
data.description: By the end of this week, I want to have this site fully ready, today we clean up the cards a little more and learn how to unit test using Jest and Enzyme
